alg.title: White Time
alg.description: Created in the process of designing a vocal art team-project @ KTH for course Information Visualization

alg.title: Rhodo
alg.description: Inspired by the infinite generosity of a Swiss family and Lake Geneva's flowery shores in early spring.

alg.title: Kuzco 5
alg.description: Somehow inspired by Disney's The Emperor's New Groove and Wanderer Awake by Android Jones.

alg.title: Shiver
alg.description: Wave artwork designed for textile printing

alg.title: Harsh
alg.description: Created in the process of designing a vocal art team-project @ KTH for course Information Visualization

alg.title: Nucleus
alg.description: A billon planets launched in all directions from a single point, leaving imperceptible marks on their way.</br>One central mass attracts all planets.

alg.title: Gravitational Blackhole
alg.description: Each planet leaves an imperceptible mark. Many planets leave many marks.</br>All planets rotate around a single central mass.

alg.title: Gandalf Thinking
alg.description: Two particle beams attracted either to the top or the bottom, with a stronger gravity for the upper beam.

alg.title: Flight
alg.description: A billon planets launched in all directions from a single point, leaving imperceptible marks on their way.</br>One central mass attracts all planets.

alg.title: A star of stars
alg.description: A billon planets launched in all directions from a single point, leaving imperceptible marks on their way.</br>This time the attraction mass orbits around a central particle launching point.

alg.title: Orb
alg.description: A billon planets launched in all directions from a single point, leaving imperceptible marks on their way.</br>One central mass attracts all planets. Rendered with hashed trace opacity.

alg.title: _Transition sc.6-explosion
alg.description: Visual from final scene of _Transition VR project with lejeanf

alg.title: _Transition sc.5-hurricane
alg.description: Visual from fifth scene of _Transition VR project with lejeanf

alg.title: _Transition sc.5-strata
alg.description: Visual from fifth scene of _Transition VR project with lejeanf

alg.title: _Transition sc.6-crumbles
alg.description: Visual from last scene of _Transition VR project with lejeanf

alg.title: _Transition sc.5-melting-fields
alg.description: Visual from fifth scene of _Transition VR project with lejeanf

alg.title: _Transition sc.6-rebirth
alg.description: Visual from last scene of _Transition VR project with lejeanf

alg.title: Hueflow natural
alg.description: Hueflow is the outcome of a project for KTH course Information Visualization by M. Romero.</br>This ambiant visualization reacts to the electricity and water consumption of a household.</br>The parameters have a natural oscillation.

alg.title: PlayChaos 1
alg.description: Morning triangular inspiration. Designed with spreadSVG.js, an SVG graphic library for random generative art I developed a few weeks earlier.

alg.title: Zeus bolt
alg.description: Inspired by Propagaciones 10, generative drawing by Leonardo Solaas</br>Artwork generated by voice

alg.title: Le lac
alg.description: Slice of vocal art performed by woman voice reading Le Lac by French poet Alphonse de Lamartine (1820)

alg.title: Duel
alg.description: The attempts of wisdom to temper anger

alg.title: Lightbeams Eye
alg.description: Moving particles with simple geometrical drawing contraints provide surprising results. Part of a collection of 25 living artworks coded on CodePen.

alg.title: Lightbeams Squares
alg.description: Moving particles with simple geometrical drawing contraints provide surprising results. Part of a collection of 25 living artworks coded on CodePen.

alg.title: Hexocet Explode
alg.description: Particles randomly evolve on an hexagonal network and their boredom on grid vertices is expressed through faint widening circles.

alg.title: Hexocet Fire
alg.description: Particles randomly evolve on an hexagonal network and scar the canvas with fire.
